name: analyze_rna_secondary_structure_features
description: Calculate numeric values for various structural features of an RNA secondary structure.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: dot_bracket_structure
inputs.description: RNA secondary structure in dot-bracket notation (e.g., '(((...)))'). Parentheses represent base pairs, dots represent unpaired bases.

inputs.name: sequence
inputs.description: The RNA sequence corresponding to the structure. If provided, sequence-dependent energy calculations will be performed.

output.description: Research log summarizing the calculated structural features and analysis steps
